# hash(into:)

**Instance Method**

Hashes the essential components of the extension by feeding them into the given hash function.

## Declaration

```swift
func hash(into hasher: inout Hasher)
```

## Parameters

- **hasher**: The hash function to use when combining the components of the extension.

## Comparing app extensions

- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two identities are equal.

items.description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two identities are equal.
